mapper.insert: insert into BNF_EVENT (ID_BNF_EVENT, CD_PROGRESS, NM_BNF_EVENT, DS_BNF_EVENT, DT_EVENT, TM_EVENT, NM_PLACE, YN_PRE_COUPLE, YN_NEWLY_COUPLE, DT_APPLY_FROM, DT_APPLY_TO, DS_ADDR, PT_LAT, PT_LONG, DS_WINNER_NOTICE, AM_PRICE, DS_PRICE, DS_REFUND, DT_REG, DS_PERSONS, DS_ABOUT, DS_FOR, DS_CURRICULUM, DS_BENEFIT, DS_APPLY, DS_NOTICE, DS_PARKING, QUESTION_3RD ) values (#{idBnfEvent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cdProgress,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nmBnfEvent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsBnfEvent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtEvent,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tmEvent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nmPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ynPreCouple,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ynNewlyCouple,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dtApplyFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dtApplyTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dsAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ptLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dsWinnerNotice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsRefund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtReg,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dsPersons,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dsAbout,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dsFor,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dsCurriculum,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dsBenefit,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dsApply,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dsNotice,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dsParking,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{question3rd,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update BNF_EVENT set CD_PROGRESS = #{cdProgress,jdbcType=CHAR}, NM_BNF_EVENT = #{nmBnfEvent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DS_BNF_EVENT = #{dsBnfEvent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_EVENT = #{dtEvent,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TM_EVENT = #{tmEvent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NM_PLACE = #{nmPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YN_PRE_COUPLE = #{ynPreCouple,jdbcType=CHAR}, YN_NEWLY_COUPLE = #{ynNewlyCouple,jdbcType=CHAR}, DT_APPLY_FROM = #{dtApplyFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DT_APPLY_TO = #{dtApplyTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DS_ADDR = #{dsAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PT_LAT = #{ptLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PT_LONG = #{ptLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DS_WINNER_NOTICE = #{dsWinnerNotice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AM_PRICE = #{amPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DS_PRICE = #{dsPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DS_REFUND = #{dsRefund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_REG = #{dtReg,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DS_PERSONS = #{dsPersons,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DS_ABOUT = #{dsAbout,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DS_FOR = #{dsFor,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DS_CURRICULUM = #{dsCurriculum,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DS_BENEFIT = #{dsBenefit,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DS_APPLY = #{dsApply,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DS_NOTICE = #{dsNotice,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DS_PARKING = #{dsParking,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID_BNF_EVENT = #{idBnfEvent,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID_BNF_EVENT, CD_PROGRESS, NM_BNF_EVENT, DS_BNF_EVENT, DT_EVENT, TM_EVENT, NM_PLACE, YN_PRE_COUPLE, YN_NEWLY_COUPLE, DT_APPLY_FROM, DT_APPLY_TO, DS_ADDR, PT_LAT, PT_LONG, DS_WINNER_NOTICE, AM_PRICE, DS_PRICE, DS_REFUND, DT_REG, DS_PERSONS, DS_ABOUT, DS_FOR, DS_CURRICULUM, DS_BENEFIT, DS_APPLY, DS_NOTICE, DS_PARKING, QUESTION_3RD from BNF_EVENT where ID_BNF_EVENT = #{idBnfEvent,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ID_BNF_EVENT, CD_PROGRESS, NM_BNF_EVENT, DS_BNF_EVENT, DT_EVENT, TM_EVENT, NM_PLACE, YN_PRE_COUPLE, YN_NEWLY_COUPLE, DT_APPLY_FROM, DT_APPLY_TO, DS_ADDR, PT_LAT, PT_LONG, DS_WINNER_NOTICE, AM_PRICE, DS_PRICE, DS_REFUND, DT_REG, DS_PERSONS, DS_ABOUT, DS_FOR, DS_CURRICULUM, DS_BENEFIT, DS_APPLY, DS_NOTICE, DS_PARKING, QUESTION_3RD from BNF_EVENT where YN_PUBLISH = "Y"
